channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As bitcoin crashes, pity those wildly enthusiastic investors who borrowed billions against crypto
item.description: The speculation that bitcoin would hit $200,000 in 2025 now seems like a dream. Because it was.

item.title: My brother refuses to sell our family’s $150K lake house, yet I pay all the bills. Do I push it and risk ruining our relationship?
item.description: ”I have no intention of going back to the lake house, yet he expects me to pay for upkeep and taxes.”

item.title: A tech wreck has rattled markets. Why this battered S&P 500 sector could be primed for a bounce.
item.description: A popular software ETF is now at extremely oversold levels, according to one measure

item.title: Jeep maker Stellantis is taking $26 billion hit over miscalculating EV demand
item.description: Shares of Stellantis are headed for their worst-ever day of trading after the carmaker announced a massive charge to reset its business.

item.title: What’s next for Rio Tinto and Glencore after $260 billion megamerger aborted

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
